entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this afternoon. A few flurries near the British Columbia border. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then clearing. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Flurries near the British Columbia border this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
